desc: Eclipse Fireplaces are specialists in electric fires and electric stoves. We work with leading brands such as Celsi, Suncrest and Dimplex to provide top quality products at the best prices. Shop our range of Media Walls, Suites, Wall Mounted and Inset Fires today and get free delivery and warranty on every order.

layout.text: Discover a new era in heating. Fireplaces without the fuss - just the warmth of a glow you'll love. The future is electric.
